description:
Comfort On-Screen Keyboard Pro is an advanced, customizable virtual keyboard software for Windows.

Comfort On-Screen Keyboard Pro is an advanced, customizable virtual keyboard software for Windows.
It displays a graphical keyboard on the screen, allowing users to type by clicking buttons with a mouse, touchscreen, or other pointing devices. It is designed for enhanced accessibility, security, and convenience.

Key Features:
- Accessibility: Aids users with mobility impairments who cannot use a physical keyboard effectively.
- Security: Helps prevent keystroke logging (keylogging) by allowing input via mouse clicks, enhancing security in sensitive environments like banking.
- High Customization: Create and customize multiple keyboard layouts, sizes, colors, and fonts to suit specific needs or preferences.
- Predictive Text & Auto-Completion: Speeds up typing by suggesting words and phrases.
- Multi-Language Support: Supports a wide range of languages and keyboard layouts.
- Macros & Automation: Allows creation of macros for frequently used phrases or complex commands.

The trial version is fully functional but will only work for 30 days.
